title: Kristen Faulkner back to racing after being hit by car during training in June
content:
The 30-year-old American will line-up at the Tour de Romandiethree months after fracturing her knee in the training incident.

Read the full article at Kristen Faulkner back to racing after being hit by car during training in June on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
